greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: One more than the number of iterations of x -> 2x needed before the result is nondeficient, when starting from x=n; a(n) = 0, when n is a power of 2.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: (PARI) A336916(n) = if(!bitand(n,n-1), 0, for(i=1,oo,my(n2 = n+n); if(sigma(n) >= n2, return(i)); n = n2));
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 08 2020
